caption.p: Trial flow diagram. AT, Achilles tendinopathy; EQ-5D-5L, EuroQol 5-dimension 5-level; GMP, good medical practice; MOXFQ, Manchester Oxford Foot and Ankle Questionnaire; NHS, National Health Service; SAS, Sporting Activity Score; UTC, ultrasound tissue characteristics; VAS, Visual Analogue Score; VISA-A, Victorian Institute of Sports Assessment Achilles Questionnaire.
